messages.msgSnippet: Hi. Do any of you know about a film  about a Japanese soldier from WW2 & the ghostly  beings that would appear to him after the war was over for him. If you do
messages.messageBody:
Hi. Do any of you know about a film about a Japanese soldier from WW2 & the ghostly beings that would appear to him after the war was over for him. If you do know could you post the name of the film? I would also appreciate if you could tell me where I can order a copy. THANKS Walter O'Keefe


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
